name: drizzle-storage
description: Drizzle ORM storage adapter — works with PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQLite via Drizzle
docs: Install `drizzle-orm` and your driver (`@neondatabase/serverless`, `better-sqlite3`, `mysql2`, etc.). Call `createDrizzleStorage({ db, dialect })`. Tables and schema are defined inline — run `drizzle.migrate()` or use the auto-migrate option.
